mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: We believe that technology and play are powerful tools for growth. Our mission is to educate kids and adults through interactive experiences, where entertainment is not an end in itself but a bridge to knowledge.
mission.p2: We do not seek to addict, but to inspire. We replace passive consumption with active exploration. We nurture creativity, critical thinking, and joy in discovery.

dev.title: Software Development & Playful Learning
dev.p1: At Webaby, we design software that blends fun with knowledge. Our creations range from brain-teasing puzzles to action-packed adventures, each filled with imagination, story, and vibrant worlds.
dev.p2: Every product is built to spark curiosity and make learning feel like play.

innovation.title: Innovation & Technology
innovation.p1: Innovation is at the heart of everything we do. We explore the cutting edge of artificial intelligence, blockchain, gaming and interactive storytelling, and modern software engineering.
innovation.p2: Our passion for technology fuels our ability to invent fresh ways of learning and to bring bold, meaningful products to the market.

vision.title: Long-Term Vision
vision.p1: We aim to become a global hub where education, creativity, and innovation meet. By uniting technology with human imagination, Webaby seeks to create tools that make learning engaging for all ages and to build communities around knowledge and play.
vision.p2: We continuously experiment with new digital frontiers to deliver experiences that matter.

global.bodyHtml:
Privacy Policy

Last updated: April 10, 2024

This Privacy Policy describes our policies and procedures on the collection, use, and disclosure of your information when you use our website and services. It also explains your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

We use your personal data to provide and improve our services. By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

Interpretation and Definitions

Interpretation

Words with the first letter capitalized have defined meanings under the following conditions. These definitions shall apply whether they appear in singular or plural.

Definitions

  • Account: a unique account created for you to access our services.
  • Company ("we", "our", "us"): Webaby.
  • Cookies: small files placed on your device by a website, containing browsing history and other information.
  • Country: the country where Webaby operates.
  • Device: any device that can access the services, such as a computer, smartphone, or tablet.
  • Personal Data: any information relating to an identified or identifiable person.
  • Service: the Webaby website and its functionalities.
  • Service Provider: any natural or legal person that processes data on behalf of the company.
  • Usage Data: data collected automatically, such as IP address, browser type, visited pages, date/time, and time spent on pages.

Collecting and Using Your Personal Data

Types of Data Collected

Personal Data

We may ask you to provide certain personally identifiable information (e.g., email address) that can be used to contact or identify you.

Usage Data

Usage Data is collected automatically when using the services and may include technical details like IP address, device identifiers, or browser version.

Cookies and Tracking Technologies

We use cookies and similar technologies to monitor activity and store certain information. You can set your browser to refuse all cookies; some parts of the services may not function properly without them.

Purposes of Processing

  • To provide and maintain our services, including monitoring usage.
  • To manage your account and user functionalities.
  • To perform contractual obligations and provide customer support.
  • To contact you with updates, security notices, or service-related information.
  • To provide news and offers about similar products or services, unless you opt out.
  • To analyze, improve, and secure our services.
  • To support business transfers (e.g., merger, acquisition) in compliance with law.

Retention of Data

We retain your personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes described in this Privacy Policy or as required by law.

Transfer of Data

Your information may be transferred to and maintained on computers outside your jurisdiction. We ensure adequate safeguards are in place.

Disclosure of Data

  • Legal requirements: we may disclose your personal data when required by law.
  • Business transactions: your data may be transferred in connection with mergers or acquisitions.
  • Protection: to defend our rights, prevent fraud, and ensure user safety.

Security

We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data. However, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure.

Children's Privacy

Our services are not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect data from children under 13.

Links to Other Websites

Our services may contain links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of those sites.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the "Last updated" date will be modified accordingly.

Contact Us

If you have any questions, please visit webaby.io.

product.bodyHtml:
Privacy Policy for {{appName}}

Last updated: April 10, 2024

This Privacy Policy explains how {{appName}} (a Webaby product) collects, uses, and discloses your information while using the app. It also informs you of your rights and how the law protects you.

Interpretation and Definitions

  • Service: the {{appName}} application.
  • Company: Webaby ("we", "our").
  • Account: your user account enabling access to {{appName}} features.
  • Service Provider: third parties supporting, analyzing, or facilitating {{appName}}.
  • Usage Data: technical data collected automatically (e.g., IP address, device identifiers, logs).

Data We Collect

Personal Data

We may collect contact information (e.g., email address) for communication, support, or account management. Additional data may be requested depending on the app features.

Usage Data

When using {{appName}}, we may automatically collect logs, error reports, performance metrics, and usage statistics to improve the app's stability and quality.

Cookies and Tracking

If {{appName}} includes web-based content, cookies or local storage may be used. The app may also rely on device identifiers for security and diagnostics.

How We Use Data

  • To provide, maintain, and improve {{appName}}.
  • To personalize app features (if applicable).
  • To communicate with you (e.g., updates, security notices).
  • To analyze performance, troubleshoot issues, and enhance quality.
  • To comply with legal obligations.

Legal Basis (EU/EEA)

Depending on the context, data is processed based on: (i) consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR), (ii) contract performance (Art. 6(1)(b)), (iii) legitimate interests (Art. 6(1)(f)), or (iv) legal obligations (Art. 6(1)(c)).

Sharing Data

  • With service providers (hosting, analytics, support) under data processing agreements.
  • In business transfers (e.g., mergers, acquisitions) where legally permitted.
  • When required by law or to protect our rights and user safety.

Data Retention

Personal data is retained only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined; logs and technical data may be stored for shorter periods unless longer retention is required by law.

Data Transfers

Your data may be transferred outside the EEA. Safeguards such as EU Standard Contractual Clauses are applied.

Your Rights

  • Right of access, rectification, erasure, restriction, objection, and data portability (under GDPR, if applicable).
  • Right to withdraw consent at any time.
  • Right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority.

Security

We apply technical and organizational safeguards, but absolute security cannot be guaranteed.

Children

{{appName}} is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect data from children under 13.

Changes

This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically; the latest version will always apply and be published in {{appName}} or on our website.

Contact

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, visit webaby.io.
